title: Having sudden drops of FPS
body:
Hello, recently I have been experiencing sudden drops of FPS during my games, resulting in me getting some freeze frames. Is there anything I can do to fix this?

Thank you in advanced!

replies.body: Let's first make sure that you haven't possibly missed a driver update recently, as that can typically cause some fps stutters like this. Along the way, double check the rest of the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some of the other main causes of fps drops or freezes.
